tetra/schematic/sword/stiletto_blade.des:
Replace the current sword blade with a stiletto blade. Not to be confused with the high heel stilettoes.
 
Material §fhardness§r increases §fdamage§r.
tetra.module.sword/stiletto_blade.name: Stiletto
tetra.module.sword/stiletto_blade.descri: A sharp, piercing dagger. Not the shoe.
tetra/schematic/sword/straight_guard.des:
Craft a straight guard that protects the hand of the user.
 
Material §fhardness§r and §fflexibility§r increases the armor amount.
tetra.module.sword/straight_guard.name: Straight guard
tetra.module.sword/straight_guard.descri: A straight guard that protects the hand of the user.
tetra/schematic/greatsword/straight_guar:
Craft a straight guard that protects the hand of the user.
 
Material §fhardness§r and §fflexibility§r increases the armor amount.
tetra.module.greatsword/straight_guard.d: A straight guard that protects the hand of the user.
tetra/schematic/sword/chillrend_blade.de: An icy blade than can freeze opponents solid.
tetra.module.sword/chillrend_blade.name: Chillrend
tetra.module.sword/chillrend_blade.descr: An icy blade hailing from land where the mountian rims meet the sky.
tetra/schematic/greatsword/longsword_bla:
Replace the current sword blade with a longsword blade.
 
Material §fhardness§r increases §fdamage§r.
A longsword, a robust dual-handed blade.
tetra/schematic/greatsword/claymore_blad:
Replace the current sword blade with a claymore blade.
 
Material §fhardness§r increases §fdamage§r.
tetra.module.greatsword/claymore_blade.d: A claymore, a powerful and distinct blade.
tetra/schematic/polearm/handle/basic_han: Replace the handle with a basic handle crafted from the given materials.
tetra.module.polearm/basic_handle.name: Basic handle
tetra.module.polearm/basic_handle.descri: A basic handle. Handles are the primary source of integrity.
tetra/schematic/polearm/handle/light_han: Replace the handle with a lighter handle that allows the item to be thrown, but it provides less durability than other handles.
tetra.module.polearm/light_handle.name: Light handle
tetra.module.polearm/light_handle.descri: A lighter handle that provides less durability but allows the item to be thrown. Handles are the primary source of integrity.
tetra/schematic/polearm/handle/long_hand: Replace the handle with a longer handle that yields longer reach.
tetra.module.polearm/long_handle.name: Long handle
tetra.module.polearm/long_handle.descrip: A longer handle that yields longer reach. Handles are the primary source of integrity.
tetra/schematic/polearm/handle/wrap_hand: Wrap the handle using the provided materials. Slightly increases damage and speed, and reduces negative effects potentially caused by the handle.
tetra.improvement.polearm_handle/wrap.de: Slightly increases damage and speed, reduces negative handle effects.
tetra/schematic/polearm/handle/hone_spee: Hone the handle to increase the swing speed.
Further hone the swing speed improvement for this module, increasing the speed bonus.
Further hone the swing speed improvement for this module, increasing the speed bonus.
Further hone the swing speed improvement for this module, increasing the speed bonus.
Further hone the swing speed improvement for this module, increasing the speed bonus.
tetra/schematic/polearm/socket.name: Socket
tetra/schematic/polearm/socket.descripti: Attach a gem where the head meets the handle. Different gems provide different effects.
tetra.module.polearm/socket.name: Socket
tetra.module.polearm/socket.description: A gem, attached where the head meets the handle. The gem is enchanted and provides magical boons to the wielder.
tetra.variant.polearm_socket/pristine_di:
A gem, attached where the head meets the handle. The gem is enchanted and provides magical boons to the wielder.
 
The gem is of pristine quality and provides increased effects.
tetra.variant.polearm_socket/pristine_em:
A gem, attached where the head meets the handle. The gem is enchanted and provides magical boons to the wielder.
 
The gem is of pristine quality and provides increased effects.
tetra.variant.polearm_socket/pristine_la:
A gem, attached where the head meets the handle. The gem is enchanted and provides magical boons to the wielder.
 
The gem is of pristine quality and provides increased effects.
tetra.variant.polearm_socket/mana_rune.d: A rune, attached where the head meets the handle. The rune uses mana to repair the item over time.
tetra/schematic/polearm/binding.name: Binding
tetra/schematic/polearm/binding.descript: Bind the tool head to the handle by binding it with rope or straps, or by using completely different materials and methods.
tetra.module.polearm/binding.name: Binding
tetra.module.polearm/binding.description: Tightly bound fibre strengthen the head's attachment to the handle.
tetra.variant.polearm_binding/prismarine: A strange prismarine clasp, the clasp strengthens the the head's attachment to the handle.
tetra.variant.polearm_binding/bolt.descr: An adjustable bolt attaches the tool head to the handle.
tetra.tweak.polearm_tweak/binding_bolt.t:
§eTighten§r the bolt to make the tool more rigid, increasing harvest efficiency.
§eLoosen§r the bolt to allow for a softer rebound, effectively increasing durability.
tetra/schematic/polearm/head/spearhead/s: Craft a spearhead from the given material, which can typically be used to cause damage to others.
tetra.module.polearm/spearhead.name: Spearhead
tetra.module.polearm/spearhead.descripti: A basic spearhead which can be used to cause damage to others.
tetra/schematic/polearm/head/trident/tri: Craft a trident from the given material, the knowledge of how one is made has been recently rediscovered.
tetra.module.polearm/trident.name: Trident
tetra.module.polearm/trident.description: A trident, the knowledge of how one is made has been recently rediscovered.
tetra/schematic/polearm/head/spearhead/s: Serrate the head. Attacks have a 30%% chance to cause the target to bleed for 4 damage over 2 seconds. Not effective against undead.
Hone the serrated improvement, increases the damage dealt to 8.
Further hone the serrated improvement, increases the damage dealt to 16.
tetra/schematic/polearm/head/spearhead/t: Temper the the blade, greatly increasing its hardness. Causes some of the damage dealt to ignore armor.
Hone the tempered improvement, increases the amount of damage that penetrates armor to 3.
Further hone the serrated improvement, increases the amount of damage that penetrates armor to 5.
tetra/schematic/polearm/head/halberd/hal: Forge a halberd head from the given material. Halberds make for an ideal ranged melee weapon, granting stun and armor penetration.
tetra.module.polearm/halberd_head.name: Halberd head
tetra.module.polearm/halberd_head.descri: A halberd head, an ideal ranged melee weapon that grants stun and armor penetration.
tetra/schematic/polearm/head/pike_head/p: Forge a pike head from the given material. Pikes are long ranged weapons used to help penetrate armor and bring down foes.
tetra.module.polearm/pike_head.name: Pike head
tetra.module.polearm/pike_head.descripti: A pike head, used to help penetrate armor and skewer unarmed opponents.
tetra/schematic/polearm/head/glaive_head: Forge a glaive head from the given material. Glaives are a longer ranged melee weapon used to cut foes down at a distance.
tetra.module.polearm/glaive_head.name: Glaive head
tetra.module.polearm/glaive_head.descrip: A glaive head, a longer ranged melee weapon used to cut foes down at a distance and to gain fury.
tetra/schematic/polearm/head/lance_head/: Forge a lance head from the given material. Lances are large weapons typically used for mounted jousting, and perfect for impaling opponents.
tetra.module.polearm/lance_head.name: Lance head
tetra.module.polearm/lance_head.descript: A lance head, large weapons typically used for mounted jousting, and perfect for impaling opponents as well as penetrating armor.
tetra/schematic/polearm/head/naginata_he: Forge a naginata head from the given material. Naginatas are a forged similar to the katana blade, with the blade now used as a polearm. Popular with female warriors.
tetra.module.polearm/naginata_head.name: Naginata head
tetra.module.polearm/naginata_head.descr: A naginata head, forged similar to the katana blade, with the blade now used as a polearm. Popular with female warriors.
tetra/schematic/polearm/head/scythe_head: Forge a scythe head from the given material. Scythes are powerful weapons due to their leverage; they're most notable for their sweeping attacks.
tetra.module.polearm/scythe_head.name: Scythe head
tetra.module.polearm/scythe_head.descrip: A scythe head, a powerful weapon due to its leverage; scythes most notable for their sweeping attacks.
secrets_of_forging_revelations.effect.in: Sets target on fire for §e%s seconds.
